pr_title: JENKINS-61208 Allow system read to view more admin monitors

timeline.message: JENKINS-61208 Allow system read to view more admin monitors

timeline.bodyText: Unsure about that one, since SYSTEM_READ doesn't grant access to view jobs, and getItemMap bypasses regular Read permission checks. So you'll be told there's stuff there but cannot see it, which seems weird.
timeline.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText:
I took the assumption that it’s highly unlikely that you wouldn’t be able to see jobs and it’s more of a quirk of the permissions system that it doesn’t automatically grant you read access,
I did hide the new view link as in read only systems it’s more likely views are added through a different process than directly in the UI
replies.author: timja
daniel-beck

replies.bodyText:
I took the assumption that it’s highly unlikely that you wouldn’t be able to see jobs and it’s more of a quirk of the permissions system that it doesn’t automatically grant you read access,

Good enough from my point of view

Would make more sense if you accessed items (and views) through a method performing permission checks.

Could be a good improvement I would be happy to see Lazy loading for jobs eventually, and the implementation would require a change after that. But it would be the least of the problems we would have
